duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct literature reviews and summarize key points to inform product teams from a wellbeing perspective.
Create content strategy to infuse Wellbeing into Apple Services and collaborate on educational content about the science and practice of wellbeing.
Develop and sustain relationships with individuals and teams across Apple relating to Wellbeing through one-on-one meetings, product team presentations, and convening of larger groups.

education_certification.credential: Advanced degree in psychology, behavioral science, neuroscience, or a related field, or equivalent experience
